sections.heading: Repealed.Section 40-11-2 - Repealed
sections.text:
History:Laws 1986, ch. 47, § 1; repealed by Laws 2009, ch. 215, § 9.

Repeals.— Laws 2009, ch. 215, § 19 repealed 40-11-1 NMSA 1978, as enacted by Laws 1986, ch. 47, § 1, relating to the short title of the act, effective January 1, 2010. For provisions of former section,seethe 2008 NMSA 1978 onNMOneSource.com. For present comparable provisions,seethe New Mexico Uniform Parentage Act, 40-11A-101 to 40-11A-903 NMSA 1978.
